text: kya tum ibaraaheem ke vaseeyat karate samay maujood the? ya tum maujood the jab yaaqoob kee mrtyu ka samay aaya? jab usane beton se kaha, "tum mere pashchaat kisakee ibaadat karoge?" unhonne kaha, "ham aapake isht-poojy aur aapake poorvaj ibaraaheem aur isamaeel aur isahaaq ke isht-poojy kee bandagee karenge - jo akela isht-poojy hai, aur ham usee ke aagyaakaaree (muslim) hain.
